/locationNotes/%2Fteam%2Flocation%2Fc3bf: {"type": "edit", "field": "description", "label": "Description", "before": "\u2022 CIDNY has three offices across NYC. Residents 14 and older (parental consent is required for underage participants) of any NYC borough with disabilities, regardless of immigration status (some reimbursement and benefit programs are tied to SSDI and are unavailable to some non-citizens) can be served. Many programs are tied to employment, so a valid work permit, Green Card, or US citizenship is required.\\n\u2022 Services Include* and are available in many languages with accommodation for the deaf, blind, and people with other challenges.
